Name of the Content:
Upto 200 or 250 characters. Ideally less than 60 characters 
(Please enter the text)
Description of the content:
Upto 400 or 500 characters. Ideally 160 to 200 characters.
(Please enter the text)
Author: The person or organization who has authored the content
Copyright: Person or Organization who owns the copyright. Default name is DIKSHA tenant.
License:
One of the supported licenses in DIKSHA.
If this is empty, default to the default license configured for the tenant
Attributions: List of persons or organizations who have contributed to this content.
Icon File Path:
Publicly accessible URL of the Icon file.
A square thumbnail that helps identify the content easily. All images need to be in 1:1 (Square dimension) so that they do not get distorted.
Min 128 x 128 px and Max 1 MB file size.
File Format:
PDF
HTML
EPUB
H5P
Video (mp4 and webM)
File Path:
Publicly accessible URL of the file.
File size limits:
50 MB for all file types (Except video)
15 GB for videos
Content Type:
List of valid content types
This is a mandatory field.
Org_FW_board:
One of the framework attribute names defined in the Organization framework of the target collection (the attribute name should exactly match what is configured in the framework - though Case insensitive)

The value should be: One of the values of the attributes as given in the column name.
